main_definition: A device or action used to increase the volume or intensity of something, often referring to a mechanical device that moves fluids from one place to another.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To exercise with regularity and determination
meanings_and_examples.example: She pumps at the gym every day to stay in shape.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To cause a liquid or gas to move rapidly from one place to another
meanings_and_examples.example: The farmer uses a water pump to irrigate his fields during dry seasons.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A machine that moves air into and out of the lungs
meanings_and_examples.example: When he had trouble breathing, he used an inhaler to help him breathe easier.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To forcefully draw or squeeze something; especially a liquid
meanings_and_examples.example: She pumps the brakes of her car when she needs to stop quickly.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A slang term referring to increasing one's physical fitness and endurance through exercise
meanings_and_examples.example: He decided to start pumping weights in order to build more muscle mass.
